name: guardian-plex
tagline: A self-hosted dashboard for monitoring Docker containers and system metrics
description: Guardian is a self-hosted web dashboard for monitoring Docker containers and system metrics. It provides a clean UI for viewing container state, logs, and resource usage in real-time.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Track Docker container status, health, and resource consumption in real-time

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access container logs directly from the web interface for troubleshooting

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Start, stop, restart, and remove containers from the dashboard

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Simple, intuitive dashboard focused on essential container information

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal overhead suitable for running alongside monitored containers
